name: UNITED REFORMERS ORGANIZATION

address: 6/10,URO Road, Prince Colony Lower Idgah Hills

briefDescription: With the underlying  concept to provide social service ,to the poorest of poor ,Dalits ,Minority community ,Economically/Socially neglected & Marginalized.A group of renowned people ,each one being expert in his/her own field ,including professionals in the area of development & dedicated Volunteers ,got together and laid the conceptual  foundation of United Reformation Organization â€“URO (Centre for Reformation & Development )on 2nd November 1983 & was registered in the year 1987 under the Madhya Pradesh Societies registration Act.Under the Health /sanitation & environment care Organization Medical Team of Doctors /Paramedics and Volunteers treated thousands of Gas Victims /poor patients , including Students through Medical centre /Camps and School Health Services . Plantation to protect Environment , Disaster Management , HIV/AIDS & Elders Care issues . Governance issues addressed through orientation of Govt. Functionaries ,Sarpanch /Panch / parshads & community, on RTI and Panchayat Raj act (73/74). many people of Sehore District ,Block ichhawar benefited in 70 panchayats.. URO Computer and Study Centre provides training .education and space to students/elders/women under one  roof. To aware Society Human Rights /women /child  Minority & peace harmony issues were also initiated .
